Work Experience.title: WireBuddy (Internship)

text: Working with a team of Senior Developers to create the WireBuddy app using ReactJS, Redux, TypeScript, and Styled Components. WireBuddy is a Web & Mobile Application for Professionals such as Electricians to run their day-to-day business, e.g. Send Quotes, Track Jobs, Book Calendar events, and Manage Invoices & Payments.
Designing and developing application components for the Web app from the ground up, e.g. Users, Customers, Calendar, and Billing, using Redux to manage app state
Integrated the Front-End UI application to the serverside components abstracting backend database using a RESTful API
Created Back-End API Endpoints using Python that handles storing of data using MySQL and testing.
Involved in completing software development lifecycles - Development, Integration, Code reviews, Testing and merging of feature branches into the master branch.
Working in pair programming, Daily Scrum calls and code reviews.
